statements.statement: I think that the most important contribution from IIMHL is information sharing
I wish there would be more information sharing in this community
I feel that I am provided with many opportunities for active continuous collaboration in projects through IIMHL
IIMHL should focus more on opportunities for its members to collaborate in different projects
I think IIMHL should be focusing on health and social care providers
I think IIMHL has all ‘right’ people involved
I would like to see more people from across all sectors (education, work, business, arts etc. engaged in IIMHL
I think I currently contribute enough to the network
I am willing to contribute more (time, financial support etc.) to the network in the future
I think people would be willing to contribute more to IIMHL
I think one of the core strength of IIMHL is that the financing comes uniquely from national governments
I think IIMHL should expand its core membership to other levels of government (state, provincial, local etc.)
I would like to see a broader membership base that could be open to paying membership from others such as NGO-sector organizations, large businesses etc.
I think IIMHL focuses too much on leaders in policy development
I think IIMHL has too strong a focus on leaders of direct service provision
I wish IIMHL would work more with leaders in newer sectors for mental health such as education, work, city and regional development etc.
I hope IIMHL would focus more on leaders of direct service provision
I think it is good that it is up to the country that hosts the leadership exchange to set most priorities for the leadership exchange
In my opinion, IIMHL has too high focus on shared work between leadership exchanges
I would have appreciated that IIMHL would keep a longer term focus on a set of priorities that reoccur at each leadership exchange
I think IIMHL should be zooming in on leadership much more
In my opinion, the leadership exchange is the most important service IIMHL provides
Personal networking opportunities is the single most important value I get out of IIMHL
The written reports bi-monthly IIMHL and IIDL updates and the quarterly Make it So –reports provides a lot of value for me
I wish IIMHL would provide more workshops/training/education opportunities between leadership exchanges
I think IIMHL could develop a mentorship programme
